entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:29 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 07:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
